database.name: VIEW EHCM_JOINLEAVE_DECNO_V
database.view: SELECT ehcm_employment_info.ehcm_employment_info_id AS ehcm_joinleave_decno_v_id, ehcm_employment_info.ad_client_id, ehcm_employment_info.ad_org_id, ehcm_employment_info.isactive, ehcm_employment_info.created, ehcm_employment_info.createdby, ehcm_employment_info.updated, ehcm_employment_info.updatedby, ehcm_employment_info.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id, ehcm_employment_info.changereason, ehcm_employment_info.decision_no FROM ehcm_employment_info WHERE 1 = 1 AND (ehcm_employment_info.changereason = 'H' OR (ehcm_employment_info.changereason IN ('SEC', 'EXSEC', 'COSEC'))) UNION ALL SELECT summary.ehcm_scholarship_summary_id AS ehcm_joinleave_decno_v_id, summary.ad_client_id, summary.ad_org_id, summary.isactive, summary.created, summary.createdby, summary.updated, summary.updatedby, summary.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id, 'SCTR' AS changereason, summary.decision_no FROM ehcm_scholarship_summary summary LEFT JOIN ehcm_emp_perinfo_v emp ON summary.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = emp.ehcm_emp_perinfo_v_id UNION ALL SELECT emptransfer.ehcm_emp_transfer_id AS ehcm_joinleave_decno_v_id, emptransfer.ad_client_id, emptransfer.ad_org_id, emptransfer.isactive, emptransfer.created, emptransfer.createdby, emptransfer.updated, emptransfer.updatedby, emptransfer.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id, emptransfer.transfer_type AS changereason, emptransfer.decision_no FROM ehcm_emp_transfer emptransfer LEFT JOIN ehcm_emp_perinfo emp ON emp.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = emptransfer.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id WHERE emptransfer.isjoinworkreq = 'Y' AND emptransfer.isactive = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ehcm_employment_info.ehcm_employment_info_id AS ehcm_joinleave_decno_v_id, ehcm_emp_transfer.ad_client_id, ehcm_emp_transfer.ad_org_id, ehcm_emp_transfer.isactive, ehcm_emp_transfer.created, ehcm_emp_transfer.createdby, ehcm_emp_transfer.updated, ehcm_emp_transfer.updatedby, ehcm_emp_transfer.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id, ehcm_emp_transfer.transfer_type AS changereason, ehcm_emp_transfer.decision_no FROM ehcm_employment_info LEFT JOIN ehcm_emp_transfer ON ehcm_emp_transfer.ehcm_emp_transfer_id = ehcm_employment_info.ehcm_emp_transfer_id WHERE ehcm_emp_transfer.isjoinworkreq = 'N' AND ehcm_emp_transfer.isactive = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT promotion.ehcm_emp_promotion_id AS ehcm_joinleave_decno_v_id, promotion.ad_client_id, promotion.ad_org_id, promotion.isactive, promotion.created, promotion.createdby, promotion.updated, promotion.updatedby, promotion.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id, promotion.promotion_type AS changereason, promotion.decision_no FROM ehcm_emp_promotion promotion LEFT JOIN ehcm_emp_perinfo emp ON emp.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = promotion.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id WHERE promotion.isjoinworkreq = 'Y' AND promotion.isactive = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ehcm_employment_info.ehcm_employment_info_id AS ehcm_joinleave_decno_v_id, ehcm_emp_promotion.ad_client_id, ehcm_emp_promotion.ad_org_id, ehcm_emp_promotion.isactive, ehcm_emp_promotion.created, ehcm_emp_promotion.createdby, ehcm_emp_promotion.updated, ehcm_emp_promotion.updatedby, ehcm_emp_promotion.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id, ehcm_emp_promotion.promotion_type AS changereason, ehcm_emp_promotion.decision_no FROM ehcm_employment_info LEFT JOIN ehcm_emp_promotion ON ehcm_emp_promotion.ehcm_emp_promotion_id = ehcm_employment_info.ehcm_emp_promotion_id WHERE ehcm_emp_promotion.isjoinworkreq = 'N' AND ehcm_emp_promotion.isactive = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT suspension.ehcm_emp_suspension_id AS ehcm_joinleave_decno_v_id, suspension.ad_client_id, suspension.ad_org_id, suspension.isactive, suspension.created, suspension.createdby, suspension.updated, suspension.updatedby, suspension.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id, suspension.suspension_type AS changereason, suspension.decision_no FROM ehcm_emp_suspension suspension LEFT JOIN ehcm_emp_perinfo emp ON emp.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = suspension.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id WHERE suspension.isjoinworkreq = 'Y' AND suspension.isactive = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ehcm_employment_info.ehcm_employment_info_id AS ehcm_joinleave_decno_v_id, ehcm_emp_suspension.ad_client_id, ehcm_emp_suspension.ad_org_id, ehcm_emp_suspension.isactive, ehcm_emp_suspension.created, ehcm_emp_suspension.createdby, ehcm_emp_suspension.updated, ehcm_emp_suspension.updatedby, ehcm_emp_suspension.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id, ehcm_emp_suspension.suspension_type AS changereason, ehcm_emp_suspension.decision_no FROM ehcm_employment_info LEFT JOIN ehcm_emp_suspension ON ehcm_emp_suspension.ehcm_emp_suspension_id = ehcm_employment_info.ehcm_emp_suspension_id WHERE ehcm_emp_suspension.isjoinworkreq = 'N' AND ehcm_emp_suspension.isactive = 'Y' AND ehcm_emp_suspension.suspension_type = 'SUE' UNION ALL SELECT bmission.ehcm_busmission_summary_id AS ehcm_joinleave_decno_v_id, bmission.ad_client_id, bmission.ad_org_id, bmission.isactive, bmission.created, bmission.createdby, bmission.updated, bmission.updatedby, bmission.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id, 'BM' AS changereason, bmission.decision_no FROM ehcm_busmission_summary bmission LEFT JOIN ehcm_emp_perinfo_v emp ON bmission.ehcm_emp_perinfo_id = emp.ehcm_emp_perinfo_v_id
